gold_horse_ent_type_process_fn[source]

gold_horse_ent_type_process_fn(d)

golden horse ent type process fn Source: https://github.com/hltcoe/golden-ho rse

Entity type:

B, I, O: Begining \ In middle \ Outside of entity
GPE: Country, City, District...
LOC: Location, zoo, school...
PER: Person
ORG: Organiazation
NAM: Entity
NOM: More general, 女生, 男的...

Example:
    B-PER.NAM

Only keep NAM here So after process: B-PER

Arguments: ent_type {str} -- ent type from gold_horse data

Returns: str -- processed enttype

read_ner_data[source]

read_ner_data(file_pattern=`'data/ner/weiboNER'*, **proc_fn**=*None`*)

Read data from golden horse data

Arguments: file_pattern {str} -- file patterns

Returns: dict -- dict, key: 'train', 'eval', value: dict {'inputs', 'target'}
